description:
Define compliance rules for engagements, commitments, and relationships (e.g., cooling-off periods, disclosure requirements, conflict checks). Automatically flag potential violations and require sign-offs before proceeding with flagged activities.

**Rationale:** Government affairs and lobbying operate under strict regulations. Automated compliance checking prevents costly violations by catching issues before they occur, protecting the organization from legal and reputational risks.
title: Compliance Check Engine with Rule Configuration
